trans-unit.source: Kyoto is a beautiful city known for its historic shrines and temples.
trans-unit.target: 京都は歴史的な神社や寺院で知られる美しい都市です。

trans-unit.source: Many tourists visit Kyoto to experience its traditional culture.
trans-unit.target: 多くの観光客が京都を訪れて、その伝統文化を体験します。

trans-unit.source: One of the most famous temples is Kinkaku-ji, also known as the Golden Pavilion.
trans-unit.target: 最も有名な寺院の一つは、金閣寺とも呼ばれる金閣です。

trans-unit.source: The Fushimi Inari Shrine is known for its thousands of red torii gates.
trans-unit.target: 伏見稲荷大社は、何千もの赤い鳥居で知られています。

trans-unit.source: Exploring Kyoto's temples and shrines is a peaceful and enlightening experience.
trans-unit.target: 京都の寺院や神社を巡ることは、静かで啓発的な体験です。
